fieldName: Baseline Period: FY 2019 National Average Readmission Rate
cmsColumnHeader: Baseline Period: FY 2019 National Average Readmission Rate
description: The SNF VBP Program's unadjusted national average rate of unplanned readmissions in the baseline period (FY 2019).

fieldName: Performance Period: FY 2023 National Average Readmission Rate
cmsColumnHeader: Performance Period: FY 2023 National Average Readmission Rate
description: The SNF VBP Program's unadjusted national average rate of unplanned readmissions in the performance period (FY 2023).

The 25th percentile of all SNFs' performance on the SNF 30-Day All-Cause Readmission Measure (SNFRM) during the baseline period (FY 2019). This value was previously published in the FY 2023 SNF Prospective Payment System (PPS) final rule (87 FR 47502).
The mean of the top decile of all SNFs' performance on the SNFRM during the baseline period (FY 2019). This value was previously published in the FY 2023 SNF PPS final rule (87 FR 47502).
The range of SNF VBP Program performance scores for the FY 2025 SNF VBP Program year.

fieldName: Total Number of SNFs Receiving Value-Based Incentive Payments
cmsColumnHeader: Total Number of SNFs Receiving Value-Based Incentive Payments
description: The total number of SNFs receiving SNF VBP Program value-based incentive payments in FY 2025.
The range of SNF VBP Program incentive payment multipliers for the FY 2025 SNF VBP Program year.
The range of SNF VBP Program value-based incentive payments paid to SNFs in FY 2025.

fieldName: Total Amount of Value-Based Incentive Payments ($)
cmsColumnHeader: Total Amount of Value-Based Incentive Payments ($)
description: The total amount of SNF VBP Program value-based incentive payments paid to SNFs in FY 2025.
